name: The Trio (MrBoiiii)
description:
Three mistical giants locked up by the humans in an endless fight for surivival. Fighting waves of enemies. For how long can they survive.

Three playable characters:

 The Mage  can heal himself with a speel and shoots fireballs!

 The Range is a skilled archer and has great accuracy

The Tank is a giant bird that stomps anybody in a surtain area

 Mana

Don't forget to collect the mana blobs to regain your power

Dark Enemies of the Old:

HellBoy a fast and dangerous creature from hell.

Skelly the remains of the old Giant race.

The Dark Mages a sect of Giant mages that worship humans. Ofen uses dark magic as thier first attack.
